stories.text:
At least after testing in some devices and checking with some people, it seems some Google services are either down or slow (timing out).

This page might give us some information, albeit currently it doesn't seem to load: https://www.google.co.uk/appsstatus/dashboard/
stories.title: Some Google services seem to be unstable
They Say: Do Not Use Margins in CSS. How I Use Them Anyway
The effect of parental leave duration on early-career wage growth
Remote debugging on Kubernetes using VS Code
Google says Apple 'should not benefit from bullying' created by iMessage lock-in

stories.text: Does anyone have any data on what fraction of YC startups go on to ultimately succeed/fail, at each successive fundraise? And I guess *how* well or badly they succeed/fail? I'm partly just curious, partly interested to try to get some kind of "expected value" of any options offered as part of remuneration. Any relevant dataset would be interesting to me - thanks!
stories.title: Ask HN: What fraction of YC Startups succeed, given each successful fundraise?
